TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content:
Top these...

Big Bang is a stupid show about smart people

I don't play Minecraft because the graphics suck.

Tolkein clearly just copied everything from WoW.

Why is R2D2 trying to kill the Doctor?
Star Trek sucks!
Enterprise was the best series.

Are the twin towers fraternal or identical twins?

(Lord of the rings)
I don't watch any Josh Wheaton shows.
MLP is for little girls
World of Tanks is unrealistic.
Well... I mean... Prototype tanks everywhere, like the Russian SPG line, or the American heavies.

Han Solo shot first...

Doctor Who is a rip off of Bill & Ted...
Google+ is awesome.

"Microsoft needs to get off their butts and make a game where Metroid has to fight something other than those boring samus."

"If you're having trouble with playing KSP on a Mac, I have one question for you - WHY are you playing on a MAC?"

"Zelda is clearly gay, not only does he look like a girl but Zelda's a girl's name"

I actually agree with that first one about Big Bang Theory.

I Hate skydoesminecraft!

Seriously if you yell that on a server with Skykids they will Lash out on you.

Edited August 8, 2014 by Dooz
"Why are you watching a show for little girls?" I love saying th... ironyyyyy.

It's gold! Try putting it on your bread!

There are too many brothers in that family.

PokÃƒÂ¨mon is a ripoff of Digimon.

Star Trek < Star Gate > Star Wars

The list goes on and on...
"I don't like the special effects in the old Star Wars movies."
"The Daleks are on there way to Alderan!!!"
I heard Superman and Spiderman are getting married, in next summer's blockbuster 'United' (its a Bro / Chick flick).

1. Attack on Titan is overrated

2. Harvester is a bad game designer

3. Phil Fish is my hero

4. Bronies are cancer

5. (Say on a Magic the Gathering Forum) Oh magix and cardz and fire and stuph oh Steve Urkel is my role modelzz

6. Gamer Girls shouldn't exist

7. Spore is a bad game

8. Arcades are a waste of money

9. Minecraft is repetitive and boring.
The new Star Wars movies are way better than the old ones.

KSP lacks space fighters...

The Stanley Parable doesn't give you enough choices to make

Spore is unrealistic and lacks real evolution

Half life 1 has crappy graphics and isn't fun

Rimworld is so repetitive!

EA Games is the best company EVAH!

Can't think of any other thing, im more of games other than movies

The following is more a scenario than it is a sentence.

A remote controlled Dalek approaches Matt Smith at convention, points his face to look directly at him with cameras pointed, poised to capture an epic response, and upon making "Eye contact" exclaims in that classic Dalek accent, "YOU WILL BE EX-CELL-ENT! PAR-TY ON DUDE! PAR-TY ON DUDE!"

Seriously I would pay money for that moment to happen.

MLP is for little girls

*gasp*

Isn't Doctor Who the guy who rides around in the thing from Bill & Ted?

I hate how they gave Tinker Bell a voice.

I hate how they made Tinker Bell more like MacGyver and less like a *****

I hate how they gave Tinker Bell a boyfriend who actually cares about her instead of peter pan.
Mechjeb is cheating

Simcity 4 was the worst of all the SimCities.

Gosh do I love SC4.
